title: Trump administration reviewing asylum cases approved under Biden
shortDescription: The Department of Homeland Security announced a review of Biden-era asylum cases after the National Guard shooting in Washington, D.C.

title: Suspected shooter part of Biden's refugee program that raised concerns
shortDescription: Operation Allies Welcome was framed as a way to help allies who assisted the U.S., but critics have scrutinized the vetting process for years.

title: Trump addresses nation after DC shooting
shortDescription: President Trump posted a video condemning the shooting of two West Virginia National Guard members in Washington, DC.

title: Trump has sent thousands of National Guard troops across US. Is it working?
shortDescription: Donald Trump has made National Guard deployment in US cities a recurring theme. Here’s how those efforts have played out around the country.

title: Police respond to National Guard shooting near White House: photos
shortDescription: Two members of the West Virginia National Guard were shot in DC during a "targeted attack" according to officials with a suspect in custody.

title: Trump to send 500 more National Guard troops to DC
shortDescription: Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth announced the deployment of 500 more troops to Washington, DC.

title: White House ballroom architect to continue despite argument with Trump
shortDescription: James McCrery II, who was brought on board by Trump to serve as the lead architect, reportedly expressed concern it could 'dwarf' the White House.

title: Trump to deploy 500 more National Guard troops to DC after shooting
shortDescription: Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth said the Trump administration is deploying an additional 500 National Guard troops to Washington DC.

title: Trump: Suspect in National Guard shooting to pay 'steep price'
shortDescription: President Donald Trump called the suspect in the shooting of two National Guard troops an "animal" and said they would pay for their crime.

title: White House locked down after National Guard troops shot
shortDescription: The shooting of two National Guard troops in Washington, DC, prompted the lockdown of government buildings, including the White House.

title: Trump's nuke chief issues 'urgent' warning about information leaks
shortDescription: The memo came from Brandon Williams, the head of the National Nuclear Security Agency, which carries out U.S. nuclear tests.

title: NYC mayor called Trump 'piggy' years before 'quiet piggy.'
shortDescription: President Donald Trump told a reporter 'quiet piggy,' prompting journalists to rally. In the 1980s, Trump was called 'piggy' by New York's mayor.

title: Tennessee poll shows a close special election race on GOP turf
shortDescription: A poll shows early voters favor Democratic nominee Aftyn Behn, while those planning to vote on Election Day lean toward GOP nominee Matt Van Epps.

title: Trump's Georgia election case dismissed
shortDescription: A judge dismissed President Donald Trump’s Georgia election interference case after a prosecutor moved to end it.

title: WH Press secretary Karoline Leavitt's nephew's mother detained by ICE
shortDescription: Ferreira was in the final stages of getting her green card, with the last interview scheduled for the spring.

title: Charges dropped against Trump in Georgia election case
shortDescription: State criminal election fraud charges against President Donald Trump in Georgia were dropped at the request of the new prosecutor on the case.

title: Should politicians be allowed to pick their voters?
shortDescription: Redistricting efforts often create funky Congressional maps that advantage one party over another.

title: Trump envoy to visit Russia on heels of leaked call with Kremlin
shortDescription: President Trump's envoy Steve Witkoff will travel next week to Moscow as momentum builds for a peace deal to end the war in Ukraine.

title: Trump lashes out at report on his declining energy, age and stamina
shortDescription: "There will be a day when I run low on energy," President Donald Trump posted after the NYT report on his declining energy. "It certainly is not now!"
